## Day 1

-   Download or update the latest versions of R, RStudio, Quarto and git:

    -   R `4.3` (or 4.2 or above): <https://cran.r-project.org>

    -   RStudio `2023.06.0+421` or above: <https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop>

    -   Quarto `1.3.433` or above: <https://quarto.org/docs/get-started>

    -   Git `2.37.1` or above: <https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Getting-Started-Installing-Git>

-   Install the following R packages by opening RStudio and typing the following in the Console [^1]

```{r}
#| eval: false
pkg_list <- c(
  "tinytex", "quarto", "knitr", "here", "yaml"
)
install.packages(pkg_list)
```

[^1]: See this [video tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u1r5XTqrCTQ) for step-by-step instructions

-   Register an account with GitHub[^2]: <https://github.com/>

[^2]: For more detailed instructions see this [guide](https://happygitwithr.com/github-acct.html)

-   Download and unzip [`day01-exercises.zip`](day01-exercises.zip). Then, go to RStudio \> File \> New Project \> Existing Directory and navigate to the unzipped `day01-exercises` folder and create an RStudio project in there and open it.
